about_lewis:
With a DUT degree in Software Engineering and self-taught experience, I have been pursuing my studies in software engineering since 2018 while also working as a Graphic Designer. Furthermore, since 2020, I have been working concurrently as a Fullstack Developer. I have worked on various projects, both in teams and independently, for individuals and businesses. 
 I also have a personal product in my portfolio, which is an invoicing solution that I highly recommend for your entrepreneurial or SME activities.
